title: Riot: Please turn down match found sound.
body: It's ridiculously loud, I have to turn everything down when it happens or I (or my friends via my loudspeakers) go deaf...there should be a way to turn it down specifically and not all other SFX

replies.body: Delete the sound file from the client y0l0

https://az616578.vo.msecnd.net/files/2016/11/18/6361504272431267551118779524_see.jpeg

FALSE

The loud match found sound means you can step away from the PC while waiting for the game to be found but still hear it in time to return to the room and press accept.

The thing is, if i'm leaving the pc, i'd turn sound up. But if i'm ever in a position where I can't hear the laptop (like other side of house or in bathroom), it wouldn't matter how loud it is, because I wouldn't hear it anyway. So I'd rather it just be same volume as everything else. And I mean, if you're on the computer, it pops up anyway so I think its just unnessecary
